vendor: [REQUIRED] e.g., Proofpoint, Microsoft, CrowdStrike, Palo Alto Networks
product: [REQUIRED] e.g., Email Security Gateway, Azure AD, Falcon Platform
title: [RECOMMENDED] Brief, descriptive title of the alert
details: [RECOMMENDED] Detailed description of what triggered the alert and why it matters
remote_ip: [OPTIONAL] IP address of source or attacker
